column6: Walker's past has come to bite him right in his ##$!  big time and it's going to take a @#$@#$ and a $@#$@  to get him out of the !@$#@#$@$@$@. It's another potty mouth chapter in the award winning cops-meets-capes epic saga from the creators of Secret Invasion and The Mice Templar. Mature ...$3.95
